name: Chaos Cook!
description:
Chaos Cook! is a game made in a week for the Brakeys game jam 2021. 

***NOTE***

If you plan to play this game in the web make sure to click fullscreen or there could be scaling issues :D

My youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/c/PhilDevelops

The music is the only part I did not make... It was made by Pan

Their youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEbzPpn2IsnaefHzu0AqfLg/videos
